import React, { useState, useRef } from "react" import { MDBSpinner, MDBInputGroup, MDBBtn, MDBIcon, MDBCard, MDBCardHeader, MDBCardBody, } from "mdb-react-ui-kit" export default function InputCard() { const [isLoading, setLoading] = useState(false) const tiktokIdRef = useRef() const btnRef = useRef() function start() { const id = tiktokIdRef.current.value console.log(id) window.socket.emit("createRoom") setLoading(true) } return (
Tiktok livestream connect

)} ) }
